CustomField.description: If cohort is before July 2015 returns a 1 if employed full-time or part-time or in school full-time. If after July 2015 returns a 1 if all any previous condition is met in addition to in school part-time. Returns a 0 otherwise.
CustomField.formula: IF( Most_Recent_Cohort_Date_Value__c < DATE(2015,7,1), IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Employment_Summary__c ,"Full-time"),ISPICKVAL( Employment_Summary__c , "Part-time"),ISPICKVAL( Higher_Ed_Summary__c , "FT"), Training_Summary__c = "FT"),1,0), IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Employment_Summary__c ,"Full-time"),ISPICKVAL( Employment_Summary__c , "Part-time"),ISPICKVAL( Higher_Ed_Summary__c , "FT"),ISPICKVAL(Higher_Ed_Summary__c,"PT"),Training_Summary__c = "FT"),1,0))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If cohort is before July 2015 returns a 1 if employed full-time or part-time or in school full-time. If after July 2015 returns a 1 if all any previous condition is met in addition to in school part-time. Returns a 0 otherwise.
CustomField.label: Positive Outcome
